title: Spillimacheen
whats_it_like: Short and sweet, Spilli has 5 major rapids with quality boogie water in between.
scouting_portaging: Everything is scoutable and nearly everything is portageable.

time.original: 20 minutes to 3 hours, depending on time spent scouting and/or lapping rapids

when_to_go: Spring and fall - low water season
